abilities.title: War Cry
abilities.text: Shout an inspiring War Cry, granting nearby allies +45% weapon damage, +30% fire rate, and +20% melee attack speed for 12 seconds.

abilities.title: Frag Grenade
abilities.text: Throw a grenade which deals 103 base energy damage in a 0.5 tile radius.

abilities.title: Goin' Commando!!!
abilities.text: Equip a minigun which deals 23 base physical damage per shot and fires 18 shots per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

classPerks.title: Suppressive Fire
classPerks.text: Consecutive shots against the same target deal an additional 3% Damage, up to 5 stacks. Bonus lost on target switch.

classPerks.title: Stay Frosty
classPerks.text: After 3 eliminations, increases Ranged Weapon Damage by 10% and Weapon Stability by 35% for 7 seconds. Additional eliminations refresh duration.

perk.standardTextFr: Réduit le délai de récupération de L.E.U.R.R.E de 17%
perk.commanderTextFr: Réduit le délai de récupération de L.E.U.R.R.E de 43%

abilities.title: DECOY
abilities.text: Deploy a D.E.C.O.Y. which distracts nearby enemies for 6 seconds. Does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

abilities.title: Plasma Pulse
abilities.text: Deploy a device which spews plasma mines for 6 seconds. Each mine deals 39,675.2 energy damage.

abilities.title: Bull Rush
abilities.text: Charge forward 3 titles, dealing 89,700.5 physical damage to enemies and pushing them away with your shield.

classPerks.title: Kinetic Overload
classPerks.text: Melee knockbacks and staggers trigger Kinetic Overload, dealing 25 base Energy Damage to nearby enemies. After melee critical hits, increases Melee Impact Damage by 10% for 5 seconds up to 5 stacks.
classPerks.textFr: Les attaques de mêlée qui repoussent ou font chanceler les ennemies déclenchent une Surcharge cinétique, infligeant 25 pts de dégâts dénergie de base aux ennemis proches. Après les coups critiques en mêlée, augmente les dégâts d'impact de mêlée de 10% pendant 5 s (peut se cumuler jusqu'à 5 fois).

classPerks.title: B.A.S.E.
classPerks.text: Place B.A.S.E. to reinforce attached structures with 60 Armor. Extends 4 segments from placement. Placed from trap wheel.
classPerks.textFr: Place une B.A.S.E. qui renforce les structures liées proches en leur conférant 60 pts d'armure. S'étend sur 4 segments depuis le lieu de placement. Se place depuis la roue des pièges.
